WorkItem.Description:
My document is still full of the word BO everywere, even after usen BibWord Extender.
Even though he seems to edit the document, I get an Error : "Argument is out of range. Parameter name: baseUri"
See Screenshot
Mac Word 2008
Mac OS X 10.6.4
WorkItem.Summary: Argument is out of range. Parameter name: baseUri

Comments.Message: As far as I can tell this error is originating from windowsbase.dll. Are you using the one provided with this installation or the one coming with Mono? If you are using the one coming with Mono, download the one coming with BibWord and use that one instead (just place it in the same directory as the exe). If you are using the one coming with this installation, try renaming it to something else. With a bit of luck, if you try to rerun the program, it will use the one coming with Mono instead. There might be a fix in there. If not, I'm afraid there is not much I can do as I don't have a Mac system around anymore to test with.

Thanks for your answer.
I'm using the one from BibWord, the one that comes with the installation.
I renamed them as told, but now it's even worse:
I get a another error now, please see screenshot for details.
When I want to open my word document, he claims the file is corrupt and can't be opened.
Glad to have made a backup.
Thanks anyway.
